description: This file appears to be a PHP script responsible for rendering a webpage that provides functionality for backing up user settings within a troubleshooting context. It includes HTML markup, JavaScript code for polling the server status, and references to external PHP includes for header, navigation, userbar, and footer components. The primary focus of the file is to offer a user interface for initiating a backup of user settings.

methods.name: checkForRebooting
methods.description: Periodically checks if the system is rebooting by making an AJAX request to 'index.php' and redirects upon success, retrying every 2 minutes upon failure.
